title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.30 - Ambulatory services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.30 - Ambulatory services

State Regulations

The essential characteristic of ambulatory services is
that the patients come to or are brought to a facility of the hospital for a
purpose other than admission as an inpatient. Ambulatory services include
emergency services, clinical services, ambulance services and home health
services, but exclude ancillary services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
